entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 35 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 35 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 25 with temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25 with temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
